long_description: moneynerd is a uk-based company dedicated to helping individuals overcome their debts by providing resources such as articles, videos, letter templates and tools. moneynerd provides extensive articles and videos debt solutions such as debt consolidation, debt management plans (dmp), individual voluntary arrangements (iva), debt relief orders (dro), and bankruptcy. moneynerd provides a wealth of resources, including detailed articles on debt management, expert videos with practical tips, ready-made letter templates for creditors, and interactive tools for valuable insights. moneynerd was founded by scott nelson, a renowned debt expert who supports people in debt with debt management and debt solution resources. moneynerd doesn't give advice. we work with the debt advice service, who provide information about your options. to find out more about managing your money and getting free advice, visit money helper , an independent service set up to help people manage their money. every financial journey is unique.
